message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,800 to make this deal work.  This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $9,600. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.

Bob, I'm happy to see we're getting closer. However, $9,600 is still a bit below what I need.  I'm willing to accept $9,700 as my final offer.  This price reflects the value of the product and allows us to both walk away satisfied.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence and I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,650. This offer allows me to stay within my budget while also acknowledging the value of the product. I hope this is agreeable.
